name: Vithil Syandana
description: A flowing, contoured Syandana for Sevagoth, the dark Helmsman.

languages.description: Ein fließendes, geschwungenes Syandana für Sevagoth, den dunklen Fährmann.
languages.name: Vithil Syandana

languages.description: Une Syandana fluide et profilée pour Sevagoth, le timonier de l'ombre.
languages.name: Syandana Vithil

languages.description: Una Syandana fluida e sagomata per Sevagoth, l'oscuro Timoniere.
languages.name: Syandana Vithil

languages.description: 어둠의 조타수, 세바고스를 위한 물 흐르는 듯 하면서도 뚜렷한 윤곽을 지닌 샨다나입니다.
languages.name: 비씰 샨다나

languages.description: Una syandana fluida y moldeada para Sevagoth, el timonel oscuro.
languages.name: Syandana Vithil

languages.description: 一款为黑暗舵手 Sevagoth 设计的流动且轮廓分明的披饰。
languages.name: 威丝披饰

languages.description: Воздушная сандана с контуром для Севагота, рулевого из тьмы.
languages.name: Сандана: Витил

languages.description: Sevagothの為に作られた、なだらかな曲線を描くシャンダナ。
languages.name: Vithil シャンダナ

languages.description: Powiewna, wyprofilowana Syandana dla Sevagotha, mrocznego Sternika.
languages.name: Syandana Vithil

languages.description: Uma Syandana fluida e contornada para o Sevagoth, o Comandante sombrio.
languages.name: Syandana: Vithil

languages.description: 黑暗舵手──Sevagoth 的流動外形披飾。
languages.name: 維希爾披飾

languages.description: ไซอันดานาที่พลิ้วไหวและมีโครงร่างที่เหมาะกับ Sevagoth ผู้นำด้านมืด
languages.name: ไซอันดานา Vithil

languages.description: Gölgelerin sahibi Sevagoth için akıcı ve modern bir Syandana.
languages.name: Vithil Syandana

languages.description: Плинна контурна сяндана Севаґота, темного стернового.
languages.name: Сяндана «Вітил»
